WORK_TOGETHER.DESCRIPTION_1: I am a frontend developer based in Munich. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life. I am looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a junior web developer position.
WORK_TOGETHER.DESCRIPTION_2: If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, contact me!

MY_WORK.DESCRIPTION: Take a look at some of my projects here and interact with them to see my skills in action.

MY_PROJECTS.PROJECT_1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.'
MY_PROJECTS.PROJECT_2: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
MY_PROJECTS.PROJECT_3: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information..
MY_PROJECTS.PROJECT_4: A very Simple Customer Relationship Management system working with CRUD functionality.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION_1: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
CONTACT.PRIVACY_3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
CONTACT.PRIVACY_POLICY:
Privacy Policy

Welcome to my website

Protecting your personal data is important to me. This privacy policy describes how I collect, use, and protect your data.

Contact Form

If you use the contact form on my website, the data you provide (name, email address, and message) will be used solely for the purpose of contacting you. This data will not be shared with third parties.

Use of Data

The collected data is used exclusively for the following purposes:

  • Contacting you and responding to your inquiries.
  • Registering and using the project pages.

Project Pages

Join Project

This is a task manager modeled after a Kanban board. There is an option for registration, login, and guest access. This data is used only for demonstration purposes to view the project.

El Pollo Loco

A game developed in JavaScript. No registration is required here.

Data Sharing

Your personal data will not be shared with third parties unless required by law.

Note on German Law

This privacy policy refers to the legal provisions of the German Data Protection Act (GDPR).

If you have any questions or concerns about data protection, you can contact me via email at contact@damianpoloczek.com.

Liability for links

Our offer contains links to external third-party websites, over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this external content. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.

Data protection

The use of our website is usually possible without providing personal information. Insofar as personal data (e.g., name, address, or email addresses) is collected on our pages, this is always done on a voluntary basis, if possible. This data will not be passed on to third parties without your explicit consent.
We point out that data transmission over the Internet (e.g., communication by email) can have security vulnerabilities. Complete protection of data from access by third parties is not possible.
The use of contact data published within the scope of the legal notice obligation by third parties for the transmission of not expressly requested advertising and information materials is hereby expressly contradicted.
